content: Enable this option to allow invitations to be sent to new {{productName}} members through the Contacts section. Disable this option in case you want to invite new members through LDAP only.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the option to send invitations through the Contacts section in a {{productName}} portal. It's displayed as a tooltip in the UI, providing context for users who want to invite new members. The translator should ensure that this description accurately reflects the intended functionality.
